theme_strategy.visual_mood: Deep Obsidian backgrounds with neon signal colors for status.

mono.usage: Verification Codes, Access Logs, Encryption Keys

usage_rules: Use Primary (Emerald) ONLY for 'Safe', 'Verified', or 'Encrypted' status.
Backgrounds must be #09090B (Zinc 950), never pure black.
Borders must be subtle (#27272A) to define structure without clutter.

layout.grid_system: The Bento Grid (Mode B for Dashboard, Mode A for Landing)
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for containers. Gap-6 for grids.
layout.container_style: Rounded-lg (0.5rem) or Sharp (rounded-none) for a brutalist security feel.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

cards.style: Flat Zinc 900 background, 1px Zinc 800 border. No shadow by default.
cards.hover: Border color lightens to Zinc 600. Subtle glow.

inputs.style: Zinc 900 background, Zinc 800 border. Focus ring: Emerald 500.

visual_enhancers: Scanlines: Use a repeating linear gradient overlay for 'Terminal' sections.
Glow: Use drop-shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(16,185,129,0.3)] for active secure elements.
Noise: Add a subtle noise texture to the main background.

image_urls.description: Abstract dark structure resembling a secure server rack or vault. Use for Hero section or Login background.
Dark staircase with light. Use for 'Access Logs' or 'Audit Trail' visual context.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Deceptive Encryption' UI by creating a toggle or mode switch that visually changes the dashboard from 'Civilian Mode' (Decoy) to 'Admin Mode' (Real).
Use the 'JetBrains Mono' font for all verification codes, hash displays, and log entries.
Ensure the 'Alert' system uses the Destructive color (#EF4444) prominently.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid Zinc 950 with subtle noise.
For the 'File Upload', use a drag-and-drop zone with a 'dashed' border that glows Emerald when a file is hovering.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
